item.title: Gaza City will be razed if Hamas does not agree our terms, Israel minister says
item.description: Hamas should disarm and release all Israeli hostages, Israel Katz says, as country prepares a massive attack on Gaza City.

item.title: Former Thai PM Thaksin acquitted in royal insult case
item.description: The former PM's lese majeste charge relates to an interview he did with a South Korean newspaper years ago.

item.title: Lil Nas X arrested and taken to hospital after wandering LA streets in underwear
item.description: The LAPD allege the singer "charged" at them and was placed under arrest on suspicion of battery.

item.title: WHO warns of risks of extreme heat in the workplace
item.description: Workers, employers and governments need to adapt to a more extreme climate, the organisation says.

item.title: Beijing opposes 'bully' US for 50% tariffs on India
item.description: China's ambassador to India Xu Feihong says Beijing "firmly opposes" Washington's steep tariffs on Delhi.
